organisms.name: Slime-Melt
organisms.description: A gelatinous decomposer that breaks down fallen organisms into usable minerals.

traits.name: Acidic Secretion
traits.description: Quickly dissolves organic matter for energy.

organisms.name: Crystal Shrub
organisms.description: A hardy, crystalline plant that stores energy from the planet's intense mineral soil.

traits.name: Reflective Shell
traits.description: Protects against extreme heat and light radiation.

organisms.name: Sky-Balloon
organisms.description: A gas-filled plant that drifts through the air, filtering minerals from the thick oxygen clouds.

traits.name: Buoyancy
traits.description: Allows the organism to float effortlessly in high gravity.

organisms.name: Long-Snout
organisms.description: A fast predator with a specialized nose for sniffing out Bounce-Berries hidden in the brush.

traits.name: Scent Tracking
traits.description: Increases the ability to find prey from long distances.

organisms.name: Crystal Shrub
organisms.description: A hardy, crystalline plant that stores energy from the planet's intense mineral soil.

traits.name: Reflective Shell
traits.description: Protects against extreme heat and light radiation.

narrative: The Neon Spire Expanse is a high-gravity world where life has adapted with bioluminescent displays and buoyant structures to survive the crushing atmospheric pressure. From the grounded Crystal Shrubs to the floating Sky-Balloons, this ecosystem thrives on a rich mineral base and intense oxygen levels. Predators like the Long-Snout and Shadow-Darter engage in a high-speed dance amidst the glowing flora of this vibrant alien landscape.
